channel.title: Interbellum - RSPS Perfection
channel.description:
Why I quit Interbellum 'RSPS Perfection': I've decided to quit RSPS and take a new role in the programming community I will go onto the new language C# I think I can do it as i've been practicing alot in the past while I was working on Interbellum. I believe I can create an even better framework / content if I use a newer language. I do hope that people who download my server will not just leech I hope to see effort put into it then put online.
We were a fairly new server, the start date was 01-14-2012. At Interbellum our primary goal was to keep everything as realistic as possible and close to Runescape. We offered player's an amazing gameplay that they wouldn't forget. That includes that there are no dupes/glitches/bugs at all and if there are any found they were fixed immediatly. You can enjoy the oldscool runescape feeling again together with a perfect summoning system. Even the minor detail counts if you arecoding a minigame or whatever, that's why we offered you perfection!
*
Unique features, short and to the point: - Perfect clan wars, clanchat integration - Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, 'perfect' - Known because of our 'perfect' summoning, every known special and detail(orb options, summon pures) - Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. 'perfect' - Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, 'perfect' - Killstreak system, higher killstreak gets you higher pk points! - Perfect clipping system which supports npcs with a bigger size and has support for projectile checking in combat. - Stable without any lagg or disconnections at any playercount(Downtime: only when we are updating else 100% uptime) - Forum integrated, posts shown ingame - Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs - Skilling - Soul Wars - Blast Furnace Mini-Game - Castle Wars - Custom Pk Mini-Game - Christmas Mini-Game added (Not released in server yet) - Dungeoneering now better
Media: [img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/520_12051.png[/img]
[img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/520_12050.png[/img]
[img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/1171/revenantsk.png[/img]

item.title: Interbellum - RSPS Perfection
item.dc:creator: @Java14 Java-
item.description:
@Java14 wrote:

Why I quit Interbellum ‘RSPS Perfection’: I’ve decided to quit RSPS and take a new role in the programming community I will go onto the new language C# I think I can do it as i’ve been practicing alot in the past while I was working on Interbellum. I believe I can create an even better framework / content if I use a newer language. I do hope that people who download my server will not just leech I hope to see effort put into it then put online.

We were a fairly new server, the start date was 01-14-2012.
At Interbellum our primary goal was to keep everything as realistic as possible and close to Runescape.
We offered player’s an amazing gameplay that they wouldn’t forget. That includes that there are no dupes/glitches/bugs
at all and if there are any found they were fixed immediatly. You can enjoy the oldscool runescape feeling again together with a
perfect summoning system. Even the minor detail counts if you arecoding a minigame or whatever, that’s why we offered you perfection!

Unique features, short and to the point:

  • Perfect clan wars, clanchat integration
  • Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, ‘perfect’
  • Known because of our ‘perfect’ summoning, every known special and detail(orb options, summon pures)
  • Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. ‘perfect’
  • Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, ‘perfect’
  • Killstreak system, higher killstreak gets you higher pk points!
  • Perfect clipping system which supports npcs with a bigger size and has support for projectile checking in combat.
  • Stable without any lagg or disconnections at any playercount(Downtime: only when we are updating else 100% uptime)
  • Forum integrated, posts shown ingame
  • Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs
  • Skilling
  • Soul Wars
  • Blast Furnace Mini-Game
  • Castle Wars
  • Custom Pk Mini-Game
  • Christmas Mini-Game added (Not released in server yet)
  • Dungeoneering now better
